lead_paragraph: Congress should carefully consider the Obama administration’s viable plan to shut down the prison at Guantánamo Bay by the end of the year.

headline.print_headline: The Plan to Shut Down Gitmo
headline.main: The Plan to Shut Down Gitmo

snippet: Congress should carefully consider the Obama administration’s viable plan to shut down the prison at Guantánamo Bay by the end of the year.
abstract: Editorial underscores feasibility of Obama administration plan to shut down Guantanamo Bay Naval Base prison facility; calls on chairmen of relevant House and Senate subcommittees to work with administration rather than continuing to obstruct process; notes administration must address question of what to do with future terrorism suspects apprehended in ongoing military campaigns.
